name: Limited Escape v1.0.3
description:
This is a game created for BenBonk Jam #2.

IMPORTANT: If you want to experience the game with PostProcessing effects, play the Windows version.

Description:

On a limited space, you must destroy enemies in order to gather their "Power Cube" to activate a Portal to escape.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Fire Weapon: Left mouse button

Credits:

  • Game, Design: Myself
  • Music: StaryKnight
